doc.name: AbstractSourceStation
doc.description: This abstract actor models a source staton which receives a record token. This token is a train decides to move. Therefore, this actor just sends the train out. At each (take off) time, just one train can move. If the destination track is unavailable, then station try to send it after a period of time.
doc.author: Maryam Bagheri
doc.port: The output port. The type is a that of a Record.
doc.property: The delay. The initial default is 1.0.
The station id. The initial value is -1.
The takeoff. The initial value is 1.
The line symbol. The default type is that of String.
